Title: Social Media Specialist, Innisfree - Toronto, ON - Indeed.com
Description:
Job Summary
Amorepacific Canada is seeking an experienced Social Media Specialist to join the Innisfree Marketing team. While 3+ years of experience in Social Media & Influencer Marketing is preferred, ideal candidate will also have experience in the beauty & skincare industry. Individual must be driven, flexible and be capable of making quick yet thorough decisions in order to keep up with the fast-paced world of Social Media, and produce high-quality social content. His/her efforts will focus on programs across the Innisfree Marketing team, driving new customer acquisition, increased engagement and social commerce, as well as influencer management. This position will work closely with Marketing, PR, and Designers to refine and execute social media content strategies. Strong sphere of influence and exceptional collaboration are critical to the role. This position also works closely with vendor, brand partners and agencies to drive integrated content and creative social media efforts that are measurable and impactful. This position will report to General Manager, APCA.
Principal Accountabilities
Manage core day-to-day social media content management and operations
Responsible for content planning, development of visual assets and copywriting, execution and creative optimization process end-to-end, to attract engage and grow audience
Maintain consistent visual tone and voice across all social channels
Assist to develop and own the execution of the monthly content calendar(s)
Brainstorm and create content for Instagram stories to support new product launches, local consumer events, and drive consumer engagement & excitement
Drive proactive reporting and insights of what content delivered the most engagement and performance
Contribute ideas and concepts for content to help grow robust engagement and achieve brand goals
Assist to develop and execute social media strategy across all social media channels
Work with agency to manage daily publishing, upload of content across brand social channels, social media community, answer product/brand-related questions and recruit new digital influencers
Work closely with marketing, PR and creative counterparts to develop campaigns to achieve brand marketing goals
Manage partner agencies for content development/creation/curation and influencer seeding
Support team manager and agency with influencer management and strategy including reviewing contracts, trips, paid influencer relationships and help nurture existing relationships
Assist in managing and evaluating influencer activations and developing network of local influencer ambassadors
Work with agency to manage and optimize paid influencer relationships, review content on a regular basis, comfortable working with influencers to create content for social/PR purposes
Manage and edit monthly Social Media reports
Proactively seek new ways of distributing or amplifying brand content
Support the execution of multiple high-priority digital campaigns as needed
Coordinate weekly meetings with brand, cross-function teams and external agency/vendors
Track Social Media monthly invoice submission and spend
Work closely with Marketing to share best practices and learning
Key Experience and Skills
Bachelor’s Degree required, ideally in Communications, PR, Journalism or Marketing
Minimum 2-3+ years of progressive Social Media experience; beauty and skincare industries preferred but not required
Must have strong understanding of the beauty space, pop culture and social media trends
Ability to work well in a small, high-visibility team but also work independently, meeting deadlines and driving projects with minimal supervision
Must possess strong writing, communication and presentation skills
Must be highly detail-oriented and deadline driven; an ambitious self-starter who is looking to bring their skills to the next level
Multi-functional and project management skills with the ability to self-start in a fast pace environment
Photoshop, InDesign and Illustrator skills re a plus
Digital marketing background is a plus
Effective problem solver with innovative thinking
Results oriented, resourceful, resilient, meticulous, has initiative, and willing to be “hands-on” when required
Possess a strong sense of urgency, able to prioritize and meet deadlines, and able to work beyond standard work hours when required
We are committed to integration and equal opportunity. Accommodation is available to all applicants upon request throughout our recruitment process. Should you require accommodation during the interview process, please advise the recruiter when contacted.
